data.title: Student Health Services
data.meta_description: Connect with Accreditation Association for Ambulatory Health Care (AAAHC)-accredited Student Health Services to learn how to find us and how to get in touch.
data.text:
Student Health Lab Hours

Mon, Tue, Wed, Fri: 8 a.m.–5 p.m.

Thu: 9 a.m.–5 p.m.

*SHS Last routine appointment scheduled is at 4:15 p.m.

Pharmacy Hours:

Mon, Tue, Wed, Fri: 8 a.m.–5 p.m.

Thu: 9 a.m.–5 p.m.

*Lab Hours:

Mon, Tue, Wed, Fri: 8 a.m.–5 p.m.

Thu: 9 a.m.–5 p.m.

*LAB Last walk-in for services is at 2:45 p.m.

Closed on weekends and UCR holidays.
